quest.name: Uncommon Scents
journal:
 Quest Sync
Boragchin eyes you with a calculating look.
objectives: Place the slabs of raw meat.

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: You have an air of dangerous competence, and you are most certainly not Sharlayan. Yes...yes, you should do nicely!

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: For what, you may ask? As the overseer of the wildlife in this sector, I often find myself in need of new volunteers to help with the feeding.

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: While I am perfectly content to perform the task myself, it would be, ahem, unwise to allow the carnivores to grow too accustomed to my scent─or that of any of my colleagues, for that matter.

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: Which is why I am pleased to encounter “fresh meat” like you, if you'll excuse the phrase. So! What say you to a brief foray into the forest? You will be provided with suitable recompense, of course.

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: Wonderful! Here, take these hunks of raw flesh and just set them down at these locations. Hurry back as soon as you're done!

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: Once you've placed the meat, I don't suggest you tarry in the area...unless you wish to be mistaken for the main course!

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: Look at you─all finished, and with a distinct lack of bleeding and sobbing! This is why I prefer to employ mercenary types to feed our more aggressive specimens.

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: Fortunately, I can simply let the carnivores hunt down their own meals much of the time. But this is a closed habitat...

dialogue.name: BORAGCHIN
dialogue.text: If we don't intervene to fill bellies on occasion, the delicate equilibrium between predator and prey will all come crashing down. Thank you for helping to maintain that balance.
